website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch adjustable weight bench is sturdy, strong, and built to last.
pros: Bench can be instantly adjusted from flat to full incline
Intended for use with cages, power racks, and dumbbells
Features rubber feet that limit the risk of scratches, scuffs, and other damage to your floors
cons: Powder coating tends to wear off the frame quickly
Less stable than many similar benches

customer_reviews.title: Needs Quality Control Prior to Shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied but not completely happy with purchase. The cushioned backboard had fabric not secured to the bottom edge right out of the box. Appears too little fabric was used because the sewn seam didn't even perforate the fabric. The plywood that the fabric and cushion is fastened to was badly warped making it difficult to bolt to the bench during assembly. I was afraid the threads would rip out because of this, but so far it has held fine and the wood will probably settle/bend back into its intended state.
customer_reviews.author: JstCruzn86

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is well worth the money. It came packaged well and nearly fully assembled. All I had to do was attach the two cushions. It is a solid bench and is well built. I have no issues with anything being bent or out of alignment. This bench exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: solo3

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a highly rated incline bench and this one is perfect. I looked at a lot of other adjustable benches and chose this one. I preferred the added support over having an option to do decline. It's solidly built and takes no time to put together. The packaging is decent. The only issue I had was that one spot on the leather underneath the bench arrived with a small hole from another part rubbing against it. I'll probably put small electrical tape over it. Not a big deal. It adjusts easily, rolls around nicely and doesn't move when benching. Nice buy for the price. (The price is lower on their website but their shipping is more.)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hasser

customer_reviews.title: BEST ONE OUT THERE?
customer_reviews.text: GOOD BENCH-VERY WELL BUILT-GREAT FOR HOME GYMS OR COMMERICAL USE- I have searched for a moderate sized high capacity ladder bench for several years. I was very pleased when I found this one from REP FITNESS. It is the perfect height(which was a big consideration for me) and the ladder adjustment is ultra quick with nothing to break,pop, or screw in and out like many other benches. Also the gap between cushions is very small (another plus). IT IS VERY WELL PRICED AND ALL AND ALL PROPOBLY THE BEST ON THE MARKET! I am very happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: flex

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for a long time for a bench. Read many reviews from sources other than Amazon, and this was the consensus closest-to-commercial bench start the best price. The V3 pad upgrade sold me on the purchase and it is well worth it. Only 8 bolts in the assembly. My 9 year old son wanted to help me put it together, and honestly he could have done it himself. I have several other rep products and they are an excellent company. They have a great customer service line too - I called them to see the best way to purchase the bench, and they recommended Amazon if they shipping worked out to be cheaper (instead of a direct purchase).
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Justice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bench, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'6" powerlifter and I love this bench. It's long enough for me to bench without my head hanging over the top. It's sturdy enough that I don't worry when I'm doing heavy lifts (Just got it this week so I haven't maxed out on it yet, but I weigh ~300 and I've pressed 305 for reps with no wobble at all). There's practically no gap on this bench, and the pads are nice and firm. Overall, best bench I've ever used (outside of maybe one or two benches in a strongman gym that my cousin works out at). Definitely the best bench for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Henry

customer_reviews.title: Mad decent
customer_reviews.text: I've been a strength and conditioning coach for a while now and I've gone through a lot of benches. In my personal opinion rep fitness makes the best benches in its price bracket. For any gym in a pinch or anyone with a home gym I doubt you'll be disappointed in this product. Sturdy and leather is pretty tough. Right height for most people and no frills.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bench for months. After looking at them in stores and reading the reviews I got this one. Very well built and great customer service. During assembly, which was easy, one thread on the back of the main pad loosen so that I could not tighten the bolt. I emailed the company and I had a replacement pad sent out right away.
customer_reviews.author: For Life

customer_reviews.title: Great bench. To get something marginally better
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. To get something marginally better, you'd probably pay twice as much. If you want to have no lateral movement in the back support area, two 3/4 socket wrenches are needed to tighten the bolt between the seat and the base of the back support. Very satisfied with purchase after a long, long search
customer_reviews.author: DrrllM

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Back piece has a little play side to side. Also, the protective coating on the metal breaks off where there is constant friction. Other than that, good product. Handles a persons weight nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mauv

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Value
customer_reviews.text: I've read a few reviews where some odd things were wrong with this bench. I feel that those instances are outliers, because this bench is awesome. Yes, it is built as a budget piece, but it has quality inn all the right places. All of the supports are beefy, the gap between the bottom and back pad is minimal, the pads and covers for them are pretty good quality. If you have a home gym with a power rack or any other similar setup and want to save some cash, this is the bench for you! Assembly was also a snap, as all you have to assemble is the wheel cross bar to the bench, and then both pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Heavy duty and easy to use. It adjusts with one hand and has every position needed. I’m 6’3” and the length works for me. It is shorter than my old one though but still works! It took me about 15 minutes to assemble. I recommend this for the money!
customer_reviews.author: michael r carlson

customer_reviews.title: The best balance between quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best bench you can get without spending at least twice as much for something from Rogue or Elite FTS. It's easy to assemble and rock solid, no wobble and very sturdy to press from. Not much else to say about a bench. It's much higher quality than anything you'll find in your average commercial gym and makes a super nice addition to any home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench and great price
customer_reviews.text: Don't look anywhere else if you want a high quality flat/incline bench. Most all of my home gym equipment is made by Rogue. That includes a flat bench. I picked up this Rep Fitness bench after a lot of positive reviews and I couldn't be happier with it. The quality exceeded my expectations and is equal to all of my Rogue equipment.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great incline bench for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great incline bench for the money. It's very heavy gauge metal. Better than the usual you see at the local sports discounter. So I'm very impressed with Rep. It arrived very quick and it wasn't too hard to put it together. If you don't want to spend upwards of $300+ to have a good enough bench press this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Ray in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench, but poor QA.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality in sturdy materials, but 2 of the threads in the bench pad became loose during the installation, and as such I have a wobbly bench. I would reconsider my rating if customer service steps in, as it's otherwise a fantastic feeling bench.
customer_reviews.author: Ivysayr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bench and super sturdy! Did tons of research beforehand and consistently saw Rep Fitness adjustable benches as being the best bang for your buck, and wasn't disappointed at all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Clara B

customer_reviews.title: Good for light to medium workouts not so much for heavy rows or presses.
customer_reviews.text: Not as stable as I would like the seat is pretty stable however the body platform moves and if your lifting heavy it’s very unnerving.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Cassell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy bench. My only complaint is the seat pad seems to be a little higher than the back pad when laid flat.
customer_reviews.author: D.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best all around adjustable bench under 300$
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great value buy. 1000lbs rated adjustable bench for under 250! Well made quality finish. Comfortable padding (this is key folks you don’t want a cheaper ironing board like bench). Easy to put together (frame comes pre assembled), you just have to bolt the wheels and 2 pads super easy to do. Did I mention wheels...yes easy to move around. Looks cool to top it all off. Cons : none. Well you can get picky and say it doesn’t decline but that’s about it. (They make a slightly more expensive version that does for those interested) I personally have no use for the decline function so this was perfect for me and my home gym set up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mindev

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very well built bench. Looks great and feels sturdy. Only problem is two screw holes on bench back pad were stripped. Luckily REP company sells cheap replacement pads. About $33, including shipping and tax.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but took a chance. I'm shocked how nice and well built this bench is. It took about 15 minutes to put together but extremely easy. Packaging was perfect and not one flaw in the product.
customer_reviews.author: James Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality home gym product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect for a home gym. Yes, there are quality differences from $500-$800 benches that are similar, but for home use, you cannot beat it. Some welds are a tad sloppy, and some things aren’t lined up perfect. It is rock solid and would definitely buy again. I look forward to trying more Rep Fitness items.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J Toscani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great for a small home gym
customer_reviews.text: The bench is sturdy and it was very easy to assemble. Exactly want it needs to be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lewing

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking at benches for your home gym.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this bench for a month, and using it every other day, I'm not sure what more anyone could want. It's extremely sturdy/stable; nicely padded; and adjustable to multiple angles. It's even easy to assemble - about 10 minutes with the provided tools. I'd recommend for any home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: A bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The bench pad feels good. My main concern is that it is a little wobbly if the pad is moved left or right. I'm not sure if I received a defective one or if it is just like that. Overall the bench gets the job done for a home gym though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: When I originally came across this bench it was on back order so I looked at alternates but couldn't find one. This bench is great for heavy use in the home gym. The hinge only has a small gap when in the flat position which is perfect. I have seen a lot of other benches where this an issue. I'm glad that I held out for this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: A great bench at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, went together in 10 mins. I have 2 benches from REP both are outstanding products . One is red the other black. Seems like the red is a more durable coating than the black. Love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Kim and Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best bench I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bench. Rep puts out a great range of bench products. I wanted an adjustable bench but didn’t need the decline. This fit the bill at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Striano

customer_reviews.title: Best Adjustable Bench BETTER customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bench is great for training, very stable, and REP customer service were helpful, efficient and quickly resolved issues.
customer_reviews.author: ELITE LIFE & FITNESS INC.

customer_reviews.title: This is the bench you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Kick-Ass bench and super easy to assemble. Heavy and good variation in the bench angle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Valentine

customer_reviews.title: this bench is legit.
customer_reviews.text: just purchased this bench for home use. it has all the features of the bench i've been using at a commercial gym. it goes together quickly and easily. the pad is comfortable yet firm. it is solid and well made. ifor the price range i think this an absolute steal. this bench will not become a clothes rack, it will get heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: it arrived in good shape, its a very good bench
customer_reviews.text: it took 30 minutes to put together, all the parts were there, it arrived in good shape, its a very good bench, pads are good as well, I also have there flat bench as well,
customer_reviews.author: dennis fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfort a d quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, solid build not at all flimsy like many of these. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sweed

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench. Does the job well. Does wiggle slightly but not too much of a problem. Seat is skewed to the right, doesnt matter though its just the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heavy duty bench. Pads are great and the flat height makes it easy to plant your feet. It's super stable yet light enough to roll around with ease. I've done my research and I don't think for this price point or even 200$ more you could find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Steph P

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for any serious garage gym owner.
customer_reviews.text: Best bench for the money with a 1000lb rating. Sturdy enough to hold a 290lb person incline pressing over 300lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Well built and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest best made bench I have ever owned. I am very pleased with this purchase and encourage others to try this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Tukersdad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bench
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy adjustable bench. Just what I needed to replace my old 20 year old wore out bench.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super Solid at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Less than 20 minutes from cutting the box open and you'll be pushing weights with this bench. It is super solid and should handle most situations you can throw at it in a home gym setting. It is definitely a great bench at this price point and I'm glad I did my research and settled with it.
customer_reviews.author: powerwindow

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of equipment and it was very easy to put together. Literally took 10 minutes! In addition, it was delivered in less than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haney

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bench and the ease of adjustment when lifting. Not having to pull pins is awesome. The only thing I would improve is the quality and density of the pad. But it is still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wesley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Incline bench
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is when standing the bench up, the seat slides causing the bench to move and possibly fall.
customer_reviews.author: Shamus Vizena

customer_reviews.title: ... will "fall" into place once under load but overall good for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little bit hard to lock the bench into some of the positions and if you aren't careful it will "fall" into place once under load but overall good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ohlmaier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will need to tighten things up but once that's done it's rock-solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Ma

customer_reviews.title: Solid adjustable bench, bad hinge placement
customer_reviews.text: solid bench, easy to assemble and use. Only downside is the hinge is super high up so if you roll over it with your tailbone, you'll feel it (and it doesn't feel good)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Becker

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable bench is amazing! Very solid and sturdy! Love the color too
customer_reviews.author: ABLE

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and steady
customer_reviews.text: Very strong bench, I'm impressed , this is what I called heavy duty. Placing my order on the flat next week . 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and move around. Sturdy, comfortable, and quality product. Highly recommend and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TraumaRN

customer_reviews.title: Good bench for the value
customer_reviews.text: Good bench for the value. Shipping was fast. Assembly was easy. Can be stored upright, but I wouldn't recommend it. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, solid, heavy bench. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is serious about lifting.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Issues with paint chipping and damage
customer_reviews.text: The bench seems decent, but mine arrived with paint chipped off and other areas it was falling off and clearly not enough pain coverage
customer_reviews.author: Hot Bod

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I like the very dense foam padding and the wheels are very convenient
customer_reviews.author: kenneth moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, but everything seems to be high quality and dependable. It was easy and quick to assemble. couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy one of those <$150 benches - buy this one, it'll last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and well packed, quick to get going on this. Very well made, very heavy duty frame and solid, comfortable padding. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: tarl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Quality built and sturdy workout bench. Good customer service from REP Fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Single post at the seat is a bit narrow for the seat, but it does not affect overall performance of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFitz90

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench will have for years. Great customer service from REP
customer_reviews.author: Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Great bench no regrets
customer_reviews.text: My first review I ever wrote....if your looking for an affordable heavy capacity adjustable bench ...buy this one ...you will not be disappointed ...easy assembly I was up and running in under an hour ...
customer_reviews.author: Madmike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to bolt together
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench. Easy to bolt together. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Performed as advertised. Easy to assemble. Solid piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Received with no damage to box but upon putting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Received with no damage to box but upon putting to together bench is noticeably crooked when in incline position... Frame is slight off...
customer_reviews.author: Won L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bench, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, especially for the money. Too bad all the negative reviews here are simply because of shipping damage because this is a good Bench.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, easy to assemble, and very sturdy. Great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ally M.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The box was clearly damaged during shipping. This is not a big deal. However, the bench was bent in two places. The frame holding one of the wheels in place, as well as the frame that attaches to the large flat side of the bench. When in the flat position, the pads are not straight.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality power coat and holes misaligned.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom seat holes are misaligned. Going to have to drill a new hole. Also powder coating is already chipping from just seeing how it works. haven't even used it yet. Also a little wobbly. I haven't used it yet for working out, but I feel it can only go worse from here. I'll change my rating if Rep Fitness from Colorado fixes this, but I read they will charge you to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: daryll

customer_reviews.title: This bench is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. I have been using for 1 month. shipped to me in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: BG

product_meta.title: REP FITNESS Adjustable Bench, AB-3100 V3 – 1,000 lb Rated for Home and Garage Gym Workouts, Weight Lifting, and Strength Training
feature_bullets: UPGRADED GRIPPY PAD: The pad is made from ultra grippy fabric so you don’t slip when you sweat. It keeps the pad durable and your lifts stable to help you hit that next PR! (Canada bench orders will still have the vinyl pad).
STRONG AND STABLE: Heavy-duty 1,000 lb ASTM rated adjustable weight bench, great for use with dumbbells, smith machines, cages or power racks.
FULL ADJUSTABLE INCLINE: 6 ladder adjustments go from an 85 degree incline to flat while 3 different seat positions give you support as the angle changes.

PERFECT SUPPORT FOR LIFTING: The pad measures 11.5 in wide at the shoulders, and we designed the incline mechanics to have minimal pad gap between seat and back. It’s comfortable to sit on but durable and sturdy under load. The top surface of the pad is 17 in from floor when lying flat. Dimensions: 50”x11.75”x17” inches.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Order today and get a 10 year warranty on the frame, 30 day warranty on the pads. Rep Fitness is a full-service equipment company based in Denver, Colorado. We carry a complete line of strength and conditioning equipment including benches, barbells, dumbbells, racks, cardio equipment and more!
